items.value: You're awake. We are going to play a game of Connect 4.
The rules are simple. We take turns placing tokens on the grid.
The first one who connects 4 tokens in any direction wins the round.
Whoever wins 3 rounds first wins the game.
Take a look at the rulebook if anything is unclear.
When you are ready, put a token in the grid to start the game.
I won't go so easy on you now.
Tie. Nobody wins. Or maybe we both win?

Controls:
LMB - Interact
RMB - Stop interaction

Hover over the edges of the screen with the mouse to turn left and right

VENTS TO YOUR LEFT AND RIGHT
LISTEN FOR GROWLING NOISE
WHEN YOU HEAR IT CRAWLING TOWARDS YOU, SHOOT AT IT TWICE
YOU HAVE 6 BULLETS, DO NOT WASTE THEM
BULLETS GET REFILLED EACH ROUND
DO NOT STARE AT THE VENTS FOR TOO LONG
YOU ARE ONLY IN DANGER WHEN THE GAME IS IN PROGRESS

Connect 4 rules:

- Put tokens on the grid

- Tokens fall to the lowest available space in the column

- First player to connect 4 in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the round

- If the grid fills up completely without anyone scoring 4 in a row, the round ends in a draw

- When a round starts, the player who lost the previous round acts first

- First player to win 3 rounds wins the game.

- The game starts when the player who goes first puts a token in the grid.
